name: Concern India Foundation
briefDescription: Concern India Foundation, is an Indian NGO involved in helping you create social change. We align our work with the complex nature of social progress, to transform the lives of  impoverished Indians. Our aim is to make a greater advancement in society’s urgent challenges of education, health and community development. We at Concern India Foundation, work toward “helping people help themselves” by assisting projects that enable the under privileged to become self-reliant and also helping them lead a life of dignity. With this purpose we shape robust alliances between funders and developmental projects. Our capacity building strengths in institution building, management support, monitoring and evaluation make our projects scalable and sustainable. Through our efforts, today we engage over 300 NGOs, transforming the lives of over 1,36,000 underserved lives directly.
